    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()

      • playSound

        public static java.lang.String playSound(java.lang.String localPath,
                         Vector2 pos,
                         boolean priority,
                         boolean loop,
                         int attmodel,
                         float distOrRoll)
        Plays the sound at the given location with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        localPath - The local path of this sound.
        pos - Position of the camera in world space
        priority - If true, will not cut this sound off if too many sounds are trying to play at once (if possible).
        loop - If true, loops this sound.
        attmodel - The attenuation model of this sound. SoundSystemConfig.ATTENUATION_ROLLOFF for realistic fadeout due to distance, SoundSystemConfig.ATTENUATION_LINEAR for less realistic linear fadeout, and SoundSystemConfig.ATTENUATION_NONE for no fadeout - sound will always play (ambient noise)
        distOrRoll - The fadeout distance of this sound if using linear attenuation, or the rolloff factor when using rolloff attenuation
        Returns:
        A unique identifier used to refer to this sound later
        See Also:
        SoundSystemConfig

      • playSound

        public static java.lang.String playSound(java.lang.String localPath,
                         Vector2 pos,
                         boolean priority,
                         boolean loop)
        Plays the sound at the given location with the given parameters. Uses SoundSystemConfig to decide the default attenuation and fade distance/rolloff.
        Parameters:
        localPath - The local path of this sound.
        pos - Position of the camera in world space
        priority - If true, will not cut this sound off if too many sounds are trying to play at once (if possible).
        loop - If true, loops this sound.
        Returns:
        A unique identifier used to refer to this sound later
        See Also:
        SoundSystemConfig.getDefaultAttenuation(), SoundSystemConfig.getDefaultFadeDistance(), SoundSystemConfig.getDefaultRolloff()

      • playSound

        public static java.lang.String playSound(java.lang.String localPath,
                         boolean priority,
                         boolean loop)
        Plays an ambient sound with the given parameters. This means that the sound will not depend at all about the listener's position. Useful for ambient sounds.
        Parameters:
        localPath - The local path of this sound.
        priority - If true, will not cut this sound off if too many sounds are trying to play at once (if possible).
        loop - If true, loops this sound.
        Returns:
        A unique identifier used to refer to this sound later

      • resume

        public static void resume(java.lang.String identifier)
        Resumes a paused/stopped sound
        Parameters:
        identifier - Identifier passed by playSound(String, Vector2, boolean, boolean, int, float) or similar playSound() method.

      • setVolume

        public static void setVolume(java.lang.String identifier,
             float value)
        Sets the volume of the specified sound
        Parameters:
        identifier - Identifier passed by playSound(String, Vector2, boolean, boolean, int, float) or similar playSound() method.
        value - How loud the sound should be (0.0-1.0)

      • setVolume

        public static void setVolume(float value)
        Sets the master volume of the whole game
        Parameters:
        value - How loud the game should be (0.0-1.0)

      • setListenerPos

        public static void setListenerPos(Vector2 pos)
